Hydras wings spread out. He held now two plasma swords in each hand. He 
hovered into the hair. Wind blowing out form his body. Shots of red flame 
shooting from his veins. "Perceptor my loyal one. Stand back your advice is 
waste don deaf ears. Cyngar...your spark's time on this plain has ended. Face 
me now traitor!"

--part1_161.1429c178.2abbbf9a_boundary
